text: AKOM Production, Ltd. (Animation KOrea Movie 애이콤 프로덕션) is a South Korean animation studio in Songpa-gu, Seoul. It has provided much work since its conception in 1985 by Nelson Shin. Its biggest claim to fame is the overseas animation of more than 200 episodes of The Simpsons. The studio also produced a portion of the overseas animation for The Simpsons Movie. Other well-known series that AKOM has been involved in include X-Men, The Tick, Tiny Toon Adventures, Animaniacs, The Transformers, the first 11 seasons of Arthur, and six of The Land Before Time films. == Animation production == ===TV shows=== * Fraggle Rock: The Animated Series (Marvel Productions, 1987) * Robocop: The Series (1988) * Tiny Toon Adventures (Warner Bros.
